author: Pieter Colpaert, VICE News
title: What Doctors in Coronavirus Hotspots Want You to Understand About This Pandemic
description: We talked to hospital doctors to hear what they're experiencing on the front lines, and what they want us to keep doing.
content:
As COVID-19 cases sweep the globe, doctors have mobilized for the unprecedented healthcare crisis, often lacking proper resources, facing wartime-triage situations, and dealing with their own emotions.
We talked to hospital doctors in several coronavirus hot… [+929 chars]
